description: Navigate to the Projects section in Linear.
task_text: In Linear, create a new project called 'AI onboarding' with a summary 'Improve first-time user activation' and a description that explains we are redesigning the onboarding flow to make it easier for new users to get started and complete their first key action within 10 minutes.
